items.description:
Happy Friday,

So April 1st has come and gone but unfortunately the global pandemic wasn't an April Fools joke. So stay inside and stay safe everyone.

In this weeks issue we have a truck-load of resources, including some great tools, training resources and articles.

Have a great weekend everyone.

❤

Kym
items.description_markdown:
Happy Friday,

So April 1st has come and gone but unfortunately the global pandemic wasn't an April Fools joke.  So stay inside and stay safe everyone.

In this weeks issue we have a truck-load of resources, including some great tools, training resources and articles.

Have a great weekend everyone.

❤

Kym

items.description:
25% Discount on Remote Xamarin.Forms Training in April 2020, book your free intake now!

In order to support remote working, Xablu offers a 25% discount on their Xamarin.Forms training in April 2020! Our trainers have experience with providing remote trainings to teams, and we look forward to helping your team from a distance! Book a free intake with us so we can discuss your training needs.

This training will teach you and your team how to use Xamarin.Forms to build polished, efficient and fully native Android, iOS and Windows apps with Xamarin and C#.
items.description_markdown:
**25% Discount on Remote Xamarin.Forms Training in April 2020, book your free intake now!**

In order to support remote working, Xablu offers a 25% discount on their Xamarin.Forms training in April 2020! Our trainers have experience with providing remote trainings to teams, and we look forward to helping your team from a distance! Book a free intake with us so we can discuss your training needs.

This training will teach you and your team how to use Xamarin.Forms to build polished, efficient and fully native Android, iOS and Windows apps with Xamarin and C#.

items.title: Free Pluralsight!
items.description:
Pluralsight is opening up their entire training library for the month of April. No credit card required. So if you are stuck inside it might be a great time to feed your brain and upskill.

Stay Home and Skill Up for Free by Aaron Skonnard

Pluralsight is opening up their entire training library for the month of April.  No credit card required.  So if you are stuck inside it might be a great time to feed your brain and upskill.

items.title: Xamarin App to Track and Manage COVID-19
items.description:
It is great to see a Xamarin app stepping up to the challenge of helping with the current pandemic.

Volunteers re-engineer cancer treatment software to monitor coronavirus pandemic using Microsoft’s Xamarin mobile framework with Azure. Mobile Angel has released a new mobile application built on the Xamarin platform to manage potential and at-risk coronavirus patients in real-time.

New Xamarin Application Developed to Track and Manage COVID-19 in Real-time by Mobile-Angel
items.description_markdown:
It is great to see a Xamarin app stepping up to the challenge of helping with the current pandemic.

> Volunteers re-engineer cancer treatment software to monitor coronavirus pandemic using Microsoft’s Xamarin mobile framework with Azure.  Mobile Angel has released a new mobile application built on the Xamarin platform to manage potential and at-risk coronavirus patients in real-time.

[**New Xamarin Application Developed to Track and Manage COVID-19 in Real-time**](https://mobile-angel.com/2020/03/new-xamarin-application-developed-to-track-and-manage-covid-19-in-real-time/) by [Mobile-Angel](https://mobile-angel.com/author/mobile-angel/)

embedded_links.title: **New Xamarin Application Developed to Track and Manage COVID-19 in Real-time**

items.title: What's the Difference between .NET Core, .NET Framework, and Xamarin?
items.description:
Naming things is hard. Learn the difference between .NET Core, .NET Framework and Xamarin and which you should use for your application development.

items.title: Animockup —Free Animated Mockup Maker
items.description:
With Animockup, you can showcase your product in action within a device mockup. Just drag some screen footage into the browser-based tool, and Animockup automatically places it into your desired mockup. You can add text, images, and adjust the styling, and choose from a selection of presets to optimize your mockup for sharing on Twitter, Dribble, Instagram and the like. A useful little helper.

Animockup —Free Animated Mockup Maker by
items.description_markdown:
With Animockup, you can showcase your product in action within a device mockup. Just drag some screen footage into the browser-based tool, and Animockup automatically places it into your desired mockup. You can add text, images, and adjust the styling, and choose from a selection of presets to optimize your mockup for sharing on Twitter, Dribble, Instagram and the like. A useful little helper.

[**Animockup —Free Animated Mockup Maker**](https://animockup.com/) by []()

items.title: Paste A Class From The Clipboard In Visual Studio Mac
items.description:
MFractor has some new features including the ability to generate a new class file using the contents of the clipboard in Visual Studio Mac. Copy pasta has never been so delicious!

items.title: Surface Duo Emulator
items.description:
Microsoft announced they will be releasing the new Surface Duo in December of 2020. The Duo runs on Android and is one of their dual-screen devices that gives users new ways to interact with their apps. It also introduces new challenges for developers to provide the optimal experience for our users. This article will help you get started with getting those emulators running

2 Ways to Run Surface Duo Emulator by Kenzie Whalen
items.description_markdown:
Microsoft announced they will be releasing the new Surface Duo in December of 2020. The Duo runs on Android and is one of their dual-screen devices that gives users new ways to interact with their apps. It also introduces new challenges for developers to provide the optimal experience for our users.  This article will help you get started with getting those emulators running

[**2 Ways to Run Surface Duo Emulator**](https://knzwhalen.com/2020/03/31/2-ways-to-run-surface-duo-emulator/) by Kenzie Whalen

embedded_links.title: **2 Ways to Run Surface Duo Emulator**

items.title: Shared Whiteboarding App
items.description:
Not anything to do with Xamarin, but did see this excellent lightweight web based tool for doing collaborative drawing. Excalidraw is a whiteboard tool that lets you easily sketch diagrams that have a hand-drawn feel to them.

Excalidraw
items.description_markdown:
Not anything to do with Xamarin, but did see this excellent lightweight web based tool for doing collaborative drawing.  Excalidraw is a whiteboard tool that lets you easily sketch diagrams that have a hand-drawn feel to them.

[**Excalidraw**](https://excalidraw.com)

items.title: Image Classification with TensorFlow Lite & Azure Services
items.description:
Image Classification allows our Xamarin apps to recognize objects in a photo. Being able to take a photo and recognize its contents is becoming more and more common. We experience it in our banking apps when making a mobile deposit, in our photo apps when adding filters, and in our HotDog apps to determine whether or not our meal is a hotdog. #hotdogornot

Image Classification with TensorFlow Lite & Azure Services : Xamarin Blog by
items.description_markdown:
Image Classification allows our Xamarin apps to recognize objects in a photo. Being able to take a photo and recognize its contents is becoming more and more common. We experience it in our banking apps when making a mobile deposit, in our photo apps when adding filters, and in our HotDog apps to determine whether or not our meal is a hotdog. #hotdogornot

[**Image Classification with TensorFlow Lite & Azure Services : Xamarin Blog**](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/xamarin/image-classification-xamarin-android/) by []()

embedded_links.title: **Image Classification with TensorFlow Lite & Azure Services : Xamarin Blog**

items.description:

items.title: Social Authentication with Xamarin.Essentials and ASP.NET Core
items.description:
Many apps require adding user authentication. This often means enabling users to sign into existing Microsoft, Facebook, Google, and (now) Apple Sign-In accounts. Microsoft Authentication Library (MSAL) provides an excellent turn-key solution to adding authentication to your app.

Social Authentication with Xamarin.Essentials and ASP.NET Core by Jon Dick
items.description_markdown:
Many apps require adding user authentication. This often means enabling users to sign into existing Microsoft, Facebook, Google, and (now) Apple Sign-In accounts. Microsoft Authentication Library (MSAL) provides an excellent turn-key solution to adding authentication to your app.

[**Social Authentication with Xamarin.Essentials and ASP.NET Core**](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/xamarin/authentication-xamarin-essentials-aspnet/) by [Jon Dick](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/xamarin/author/redth/)

embedded_links.title: **Social Authentication with Xamarin.Essentials and ASP.NET Core**

items.title: Theme Detection (Xamarin.Essentials API of the Week)
items.description:
On this week's Xamarin.Essential API of the week we take a look at the App Theme API that enables developers to detect if the device and app should be running in dark mode.

items.description_markdown:

items.title: Syncfusion Essential Studio 2020 Volume 1 is Here!
items.description:
Syncfusion is glad to announce the Essential Studio 2020 Volume 1 release. We have introduced some new components and enhanced various other components by adding new features. Also, several bug fixes are included for this release.

Syncfusion Essential Studio 2020 Volume 1 is Here!
items.description_markdown:
Syncfusion is glad to announce the Essential Studio 2020 Volume 1 release. We have introduced some new components and enhanced various other components by adding new features. Also, several bug fixes are included for this release.

[**Syncfusion Essential Studio 2020 Volume 1 is Here!**](https://www.syncfusion.com/blogs/post/syncfusion-essential-studio-2020-volume-1-is-here.aspx)
